ygData.subject: Re: Survey and Screenshot Taking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Uhm, I think Wood Elf Ranger is one of the best combo. Can melee (dual wield, double attack, kick (?), dodge, parry etc), can heal and cast some really
ygData.messageBody:
Entreri wrote:

> From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>
>
> Hi Guys,heres a small survey for everyone so if one wanna restart a
> character,they might wanna try out these.
>
> Which is the most effective Race/Class Combo
>
> 1.Elven Ranger
> 2.Troll ShadowKnight
> 3.DarkElf Necromancer
> 4.Barbarian Warrior
> 5.Erud Wizard
>

Uhm, I think Wood Elf Ranger is one of the best combo. Can melee (dual
wield, double attack, kick (?), dodge, parry etc), can heal and cast some really
useful spells (camoflauge, is one of the very usefull spells that comes to
mind). Wood Elf can forage for food rite at the beginning. And they look really
nice. heheh


Troll SK is a very deadly combo as they can heal rapidly, hit hard (dued to
their high str) they can solo well.






>
> and BTW we could all gather and take a screenshot,I think it will be way
> cool!If Gary could reach lv8-9 by Monday then he could join us too! :P
>
> Entreri
>
> Email: drizzt@...
> ICQ UIN: 2326860
> Previewer, Singularity Gaming Network
> http://www.sg-gaming.net
> Your Single Source of Everything Gaming
>
> .plan at
> http://www.wplan.com/cgibin/directplan.cgi?name=Entreri&viewpass=
